\n## Obtain your Calendly Personal Token:
## 取得您的 Calendly 個人令牌
1. 進入 https://calendly.com/integrations/api_webhooks
2. 點擊"創建新令牌"
3. 複製令牌並貼入下方字段
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 製作到特定端點的自訂 API 呼叫
Authorization headers are injected autom: 從您的連接中自動插入授權標頭。
HEAD: HEAD
Triggers when a new Calendly event is sc: 當新 Calendly 事件排定時觸發
Triggers when a new Calendly event is ca: 當新 Calendly 事件被取消時觸發
